body: The strength of gravity on a plane with this trait is the same as on the Material Plane, but the direction is not the traditional “down” toward the ground. It may be down toward any solid object, at an angle to the surface of the plane itself, or even upward. In addition, the direction of “down” may vary from place to place within the plane.
url: pfsrd://Game Mastery Guide/Rules/Planar Adventures/Planar Traits/Gravity/Objective Directional Gravity
name: Objective Directional Gravity
